fullDescription: We all start somewhere at some point...

description: Use left stick for movement / A & D on the keyboard
Use right button with arrow up for jump / Space on the keyboard
Use right stick for attack / Left Mouse Button
Find a way out of the cave
Slugs are harmful to nature; collect all the trash to clear the area
Try to hand over a plastic bottle to get a high-quality material, for this, go to the container, open your inventory and click the "Use" button
Try to improve one of the feature
